org.aludratest.service.cmdline.impl

Class ProcessWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aludratest.service.cmdline.impl.ProcessWrapper

  • public class ProcessWrapper
extends Object
    Wraps a Java ProcessBuilder, uses it to configure and create a Process instance and gives the user control of the process.
    Author:
    Volker Bergmann

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProcessWrapper.WaitUntilFinishedTask
      PolledTask implementation that queries a process' exit value until the process has finished or a timeout occurs.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcessWrapper

        public ProcessWrapper(int processId,
                      int processTimeout,
                      int responseTimeout,
                      String... command)
        Creates a ProcessWrapper instance.
        Parameters:
        processId - the process id to assign
        processTimeout - the maximum time to wait for process termination
        responseTimeout - the maximum time to wait for process response
        command - the command tokens to send to the shell

    • Method Detail

      • getProcessId

        public int getProcessId()
        Returns:
        the processId, a numerical id value assigned upon construction

      • getCommand

        public List<String> getCommand()
        Returns:
        the command tokens used in construction

      • getProcessTimeout

        public int getProcessTimeout()
        Returns:
        the processTimeout

      • getResponseTimeout

        public int getResponseTimeout()
        Returns:
        the processTimeout

      • setEnvironmentVariable

        public void setEnvironmentVariable(String key,
                                   String value)
        Sets an environment variable of the process. This has to happen before invocation of the start() method.
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the environment variable
        value - the value of the environment variable

      • setWorkingDirectory

        public void setWorkingDirectory(File directory)
        Sets the working directory of the process. This has to happen before invocation of the start() method.
        Parameters:
        directory - the working directory to set.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the process.
        Throws:
        AutomationException - if the process cannot be started

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Tells if the process is running.
        Returns:
        true if the process is running, otherwise false

      • hasFinished

        public boolean hasFinished()
        Tells if the process has finished.
        Returns:
        true if the process has finished, otherwise false

      • getStdIn

        public OutputStream getStdIn()
        Returns:
        a BufferedWriter for accessing stdin

      • enterLine

        public void enterLine(String text)
        Enters the provided text into the process' stdin and appends a line feed.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to enter

      • enter

        public void enter(String text)
        Enters the provided text into the process' stdin.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to enter

      • waitUntilFinished

        public int waitUntilFinished()
        Waits until the process has finished or the provided timeout is exceeded.
        Returns:
        the process' exit value
        Throws:
        PerformanceFailure - if the timeout is exceeded before the process has finished

      • getExitValue

        public Integer getExitValue()
        Returns:
        the exit value of the process if it has finished, otherwise null

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Kills the process.
